column4: i have a sound blaster card and i think that the sound is richer and more detailed in xp than in ubuntu, is it podssible that xp has "better" or different drivers than ubuntu?
yeah its possible... are you using alsa or oss?
i don't know, i'm using whatever is default
OSS i tend to find is better
ok, i'll try it out, thanks
type alt+F2 then gstreamer-properties to see what you're using
